definitions: glossy yellowish timber from a tropical tree, valued for cabinetwork.
shortDefinitions: glossy yellowish timber from tropical tree

definitions: the tropical hardwood tree that produces satinwood.

notes.text: Two species in the family Rutaceae: Ceylon satinwood (Chloroxylon swietenia), native to India and Sri Lanka, and West Indian satinwood or Jamaican satinwood (Zanthoxylum flava), native to the Caribbean, Bermuda, and southern Florida

shortDefinitions: tropical hardwood tree that produces satinwood

definitions: used in names of trees which yield high-quality timber resembling satinwood, e.g. Nigerian satinwood.
shortDefinitions: used in names of trees which yield high-quality timber resembling satinwood
